author: ALEXANDRA OLSON AND CURT ANDERSON / AP
title: Instacart Workers Plan Strike as Coronavirus Makes the Job Riskier
description: A possible strike by Instacart workers highlights the impact of the coronavirus outbreak on the grocery delivery business
content:
(NEW YORK) — A possible strike by Instacart workers highlights the impact of the coronavirus outbreak on the grocery delivery business, where workers are worried about their safety as they try to meet a surge in demand for online groceries.
